welcomeSectionData.heading: Have a business idea ? Let us bring it to reality!
welcomeSectionData.content: It is our values what define us and make us unique. At Tahseens, we strongly believe that your success is ours. Thus, we have our dedicated team to handle your project to ensure we fulfill all of your project requirements and deliver on time.

aboutDataJSON.heading: Our vision started in silicon valley, california.
aboutDataJSON.headingText: Our vision is to be a part of every successful business story in the globe
aboutDataJSON.headingTextTwo: Our Mission is to help entrepreneurs, startups and firms reaching their business goals by providing the ultimate and optimal business and software solutions.
aboutDataJSON.headingTextThree: Confidentiality, Integrity, Transparency, Quality, Efficiency, Flexibility, Customer Satisfaction, and Punctuality are our top values.

workData.title: Discover
workData.text: We shape brands by applying in-depth research to challenge assumptions at every turn

workData.title: Design
workData.text: We simplify design process as much as possible to build better user experience for the end user.

workData.title: Build
workData.text: We try to be up to date with modern technologies creating flexible and scalable business-driven solutions.

workData.title: Deliver
workData.text: We know time is of the essence and thats why we take project deadlines seriously

servicesData.heading: Our Services
servicesData.headingText: We have a solution for every challenge. This is what we promise. Our strategists, designers, and developers, consistently strive to deliver the optimal experience at the right time. With a demonstrated methodology and procedure, you get what you need — on schedule and budget.

featuresData.featureText: Strategy, and depth research to have a better understanding of your project idea, and to what extent it can be practical.
A logo is a part of the building blocks your company needs to build a strong brand identity.
Mockup allows you to experiment with the visual side of the product to see what looks the best

featuresData.featuretitle: Developing apps on web and mobile platforms.
featuresData.featureText: For this stage, we use different for software technologies based on project requirements and what the clients desires to use for their project.

projectData.heading: Projects
projectData.headingText: We take our partners and clients project objectives seriously and turn them into innovative and successful products, and solutions.

contactSectionData.heading: Request your project estimation
contactSectionData.headingText: We understand all software solutions so let us know what technology solution you desire. In addition, let us know what type of services you are looking for and What you would need.
